Text:
G'day, always great to see another AccadaccA fan. I also have this box set but I just wanted to clarify that where you have "1976 - High Voltage" should read "1975 - T.N.T". Well that's what it is on their Australian version. Makes more sense than having the same album title released twice two years apart.

This boxset also includes a rare 12" single called "Cold Hearted Man" which is not released in any other way.

Thank you zibbik. Random sample with spectrum analyzer indicates top quality rips.

For FLAC, I have recently feel in love with foobar2000. Not a pretty player, but pretty on the ears big time.

http://www.foobar2000.org/
